CreateCourseForm.title: Create course
CreateCourseForm.tooltip: A private course can only be seen by its members. A public course can be seen by anyone, but it may have private pages that are only accessible to members.

confirm.title: Are you sure you want to delete this course?
confirm.content: Once deleted, you can't bring it back.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
delete.subtitle: Once deleted, you can't bring it back

EditPageForm.title: Edit page
EditPageForm.tooltip: A private page can only be seen by the course members. A public page can be seen by anyone.

Invitation.text: You have been invited to {{title}} course on {{time}}

LandingPage.title: Welcome
LandingPage.text: /Project name here/ is a web app designed to assist teachers and students alike. It aims to ease the communication between them by providing a medium to exchange information, ask questions and share learning material.
LandingPage.alpha: This is a very early alpha version so there will be bugs and missing features. Please be patient as we work on improving it.

ForgotPasswordForm.title: Forgot password
ForgotPasswordForm.enterEmail: Please enter your email to reset your password

ForgotPasswordSuccess.title: Email has been sent successfully.
ForgotPasswordSuccess.subtitle: Follow the link in the email to reset your password.

ResetPasswordError.title: Invalid reset link
ResetPasswordError.subtitle: The link may be invalid or expired.

DeletePage.title: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
DeletePage.subtitle: Once deleted, you can't bring it back

password.min: Password must contain at least 6 characters.

error.500: 500: The server is currently unable to handle this request.

success.title: Email Confirmed
success.subtitle: You may now log in with your email.

error.title: Invalid Request
error.subtitle: The verification is invalid or has expired.

RegisterSuccess.title: Thank you for registering
RegisterSuccess.subtitle: Check your email to verify your account
